channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: They bet everything on Palantir and became millionaires. Inside the market’s ultimate cult stock.
item.description: ‘If I was wrong about Palantir, I would have nothing’: Palantir speculators buy corporate swag, post on Reddit and pitch their parents on Alex Karp.

item.title: Nvidia says it’s not Enron. Michael Burry makes a different dot-com parallel.
item.description: Nvidia and Michael Burry, the famed investor who was chronicled in The Big Short by spotting the subprime bubble, appear to be in a war of words.

item.title: The case that won’t go away: ECB reportedly investigates allegations of financial irregularities at Deutsche Bank
item.description: The former employee suing Deutsche Bank for €152 million has alleged the bank misused “netting” practices to boost its balance sheet.

item.title: Jack Dorsey as Satoshi? These analysts review the evidence.
‘I have no paperwork’: My father gave me my mother’s jewelry before he died. Will I owe taxes if I sell?
Wall Street’s favorite holiday shopping stocks as Black Friday nears
item.description: Winning stocks this holiday shopping season could include Amazon, Walmart and off-price retailers such as TJX Companies and Burlington.

item.title: ATON Stock Rockets on Forbes Acquisition Gambit
item.description: Meta Description: ATON stock skyrockets on bold bid to acquire Forbes Media—explore the deal's potential, past media acquisition impacts, and trading ...

item.title: A counter-trend signal in this retail ETF has been triggered. What the charts show ahead of Black Friday
item.description: Katie Stockton breaks down the charts on the XRT ETF.

item.title: Alphabet is surging on notion it's winning AI race over OpenAI. Why that's scaring many investors
item.description: Google's momentum within AI can spell bad news for other technology stocks.

item.title: Health care just did something it hadn't done since late 1998. These names on our list stand to benefit the most
item.description: An event this rare historically precedes big returns.

item.title: Chaince Digital Surges 23% on $200M AI Factory Deal
item.description: Chaince Digital (CD) stock jumps 23% on $200M partnership with ZJK for AI components factory. Explore the deal, market impacts, and lessons for trader...

item.title: Novo Nordisk stumbles against Eli Lilly in GLP-1 drug battle. Which stock is the best buy from here?
item.description: Eli Lilly's stock is soaring while Novo Nordisk is sinking. Why it makes sense to stick with the market winner, despite its rising valuation.

item.title: Cerence Stock Explodes 39% on Earnings Beat, Samsung Win
item.description: Listen up, folks—this market’s got some fireworks today, and right in the middle of it is Cerence Inc. (CRNC). As of this writing on November 20, 2025...

item.title: Fed Governor Spooks Wall Street: SPY Drops $21 in 2 Hours After Valuation Warning
